column1: Wishing everyone a happy and healthy #Thanksgiving! Please celebrate safely so that by this time next year we all can once again gather with our families  and friends without fear of spreading #COVID19. #WearAMask and #StayAtHome if you can. https://t.co/mNTUcZWTTH

Thank you to Patrice Tyson president of the Miami chapter of the National Black Nurses Association for joining me on 11/24 at the unveiling of the expanded #COVID19 memorial cemetery in Liberty City. @NbnaInc https://t.co/spbsDPcLkh

Please take advantage of this opportunity provided by @JessieTriceCHS and @FIU. In addition to #COVID19 testing patients can receive support to help manage any underlying conditions they may have. #WearAMask https://t.co/LFqnC6jnYa

#COVID19 does not discriminate. It is imperative that we all take every possible measure to keep ourselves and our loved ones safe as we combat this horrific pandemic. #WearAMask #StayatHome if you can. https://t.co/2ivyxsLrIC

IVYMI: Please check out the expanded #COVID19 memorial cemetery that was unveiled today in Liberty City and hear heartbreaking testimonies from people who've been directly impacted by this horrific pandemic. https://t.co/c7vYe2EkX1
I hope you can join me today as we honor loved ones lost to #COVID19 but if you cannot you can view the event at https://t.co/UQa9YeBmMz. https://t.co/oTN8f908PC

Tomorrow we are adding 1000 tombstones to the cemetery that was established in Oct. It became clear to us that hundreds of people have visited the site to honor and remember family and friends lost to COVID-19 write their names on the tombstones and lay flowers. https://t.co/0r5QYNb4Ei
COVID-19 cases are on the rise once again. Please do your part to help get the pandemic under control by practicing social distancing and wearing a mask when in public. https://t.co/KbHGCDJSk8
District 24 is proud to be a hub for the distribution of a #COVID19 vaccine which hopefully will help bring an end to the worst public health crisis in modern history.  https://t.co/3bb15dxh5S

Just like many other parts of the country South Florida is experiencing another surge of COVID-19 cases. A national mask mandate which is what my Masks for All Act calls for could help prevent over 100 thousand deaths in the coming months. https://t.co/BAULeKJzOF

COVID-19 cases are once again up across the nation and could continue to surge in the coming winter months. My Masks for All Act would help keep our communities safe and prevent another economic lockdown by implementing a temporary national mask mandate. #MaskUp https://t.co/1Ug0Cvyi4s
Wearing a mask will not only help to prevent you from spreading #COVID19 it also will help to prevent you from contracting it! #MaskUp #MaskForAll  https://t.co/8Ciwxn7zkQ
Alarmingly COVID-19 cases are once again spiking. My Masks For All Act would help prevent an economic lockdown and further tragedy by implementing a national mask mandate. https://t.co/qeUY468bRb

The only way to beat this virus and restore normalcy is by taking the threat of COVID-19 seriously. That is why I have introduced legislation to implement a mask-wearing mandate for the remainder of the public health crisis. #MasksForAll #MaskUp   https://t.co/GRrZaKQHSS

The science is clear: the most effective way to quickly contain #COVID19 is through widespread mask wearing. I’m calling on Congress to pass my Masks For All Act to implement a national mask mandate and ensure that all Americans have access to free or low-cost masks. https://t.co/O5RZrTUi8J

An overwhelming majority of Americans support mask mandates. In order to stave off another wave of #COVID19 cases and deaths and another lockdown we must enact a national mask mandate which is what my Masks For All Act would do. https://t.co/9VuqsN6U14

Communities across the nation are experiencing a surge of #COVID19 cases. We desperately need to enact common-sense measures to stem the spike like my Masks For All Act which calls for universal access to face coverings and a national mask mandate. https://t.co/H1CxaCIks5

#PresidentElectBiden is off to an excellent start by immediately tackling the #COVID19 pandemic. We both agree on the need for a national mask mandate and I hope my Masks for All bill will boost his efforts to end this health crisis. #WearAMaskSaveALife  https://t.co/OoLimc2OLh
Please don't come to District 24 Mr. Trump. Your rallies are superspreader events and we have had enough #COVID19 deaths! https://t.co/nL9OmuMIck
These tombstones represent the family members and friends we lost to #COVID19 too many of whom died alone. https://t.co/T6KwEwW8mC

The #COVID19 pandemic has been devastating to everyone--Americans and people all over the world. I created memorial cemeteries at Simonhoff and Griffing parks to help our community collectively mourn and heal. https://t.co/horRGCC2eJ
ICYMI: If you have lost someone to #COVID19 you can honor them at the memorial cemeteries I've erected at Simonhoff and Griffing parks. https://t.co/Ki6S5Y5IKC

Each day we are reminded of the terrible toll the #COVID19 pandemic is taking on our families and friends. This memorial will enable our community to collectively grieve and to name and honor loved ones in a public space of shared mourning. https://t.co/6uS9l58TzC
#Coronavirus infections and deaths are soaring across the nation. My Masks for All Act will help bring those numbers down. #WearAMaskSaveALife and #Vote! https://t.co/jRW0rRdsYB
It is heartbreaking how the #COVID19 pandemic is creating food insecurity for so many families! https://t.co/62QwdTzczj

#COVID19 infections are on the rise in Florida and the U.S. That's why I introduced H.R. 7607 the Masks for All Act which would require the use of face masks in all public spaces and outside when one cannot maintain a physical distance. #WearAMaskSaveALife https://t.co/csQRbyWRCX

If the #COVID19 pandemic is winding down as Donald Trump proclaims why are the number of infections in Florida and in dozens of states across the nation on a dangerous rise? Don't believe his hype. #WearAMaskSaveALife  https://t.co/Czb4x6GeRu
Contrary to what some people [falsely] state #COVID19 is still a huge problem in Florida and across the states. #WearAMask #VoteEarly

While you are in Miami President Trump stop by our Covid-19 community memorial cemetery in Liberty City. Pay your respects and refrain from diminishing the thousands who have died in my district from this novel disease. https://t.co/0cmxOotYmQ
#COVID19 cases are rising in states across the nation including Florida. #WashYourHands #WearAMask  https://t.co/rAugob9XkQ

Circle of Brotherhood member Ed Haynes provided this preview of the memorial cemetery in Liberty City that we erected to honor lives lost to #COVID19 before our press conference today. https://t.co/5VJHLjlGix

Please tune in to @Hot105 tomorrow for this important discussion about #COVID19. https://t.co/cBvOyenvCD

Donald Trump is bragging about the world-class #COVID19 care he received that is far beyond the reach of average Americans. Instead of being grateful he and the #GOP are coming for your health care by going after the #AffordableCareAct. That’s not right. RT if you agree.
Contracting #COVID19 is the polar opposite of a blessing. #CrazyTalk https://t.co/NIJfjXFahY
Mike Pence should be QUARANTINED. He Should not be on a debate Stage spreading the coronavirus! HELP AMERICA! SPEAK OUT! https://t.co/paH8qMhTU4

Example number I've-lost-count of Trump's callous disregard and disrespect for American people communities and businesses buckling under the effects of the #COVID19 pandemic. He is not #ForThePeople! #SpreaderInChief https://t.co/5Bm49nLfId

There is a web of secrecy surrounding the #coronavirus spread in the president’s inner circle and how many of them are infected and contagious. How much of the truth will the American people be told? We will likely never know. #SpreaderInChief https://t.co/xX6OBTp7uk

The effects of coronavirus on children and their education is deeply concerning.  The updated #HeroesAct passed last week provides $225 billion for education nationwide including $182 billion for K12 schools & nearly $39 billion for postsecondary education. https://t.co/2futoMm4R0
The White House is now an epicenter for the coronavirus. https://t.co/Dkhnz73x50
How can we trust this White House to protect the nation from #COVID19 when it can’t even protect itself? https://t.co/1FJeC3v2h1

The census count will end on September 30. Please complete your census if you've not already done so and urge everyone you know to do the same. The #COVID19 pandemic has forced many more people to rely on the social safety net to survive. An undercount will cut a huge hole in it. https://t.co/5Ki0lb7gGo

The nation has reached a grim milestone with 200000 people dead from #COVID19. This deadly virus does not discriminate. Please for your sake and the sake of others #WearAMaskSaveALife! https://t.co/spsQZ05HfR

The most effective way to quickly contain #COVID19 and prevent further tragedy and economic harm is through the widespread use of face masks. That's why I've introduced the Masks for All Act which mandates masks in public spaces. We must all do our part! #WearAMaskSaveALife https://t.co/rmllR4pWf4

March 19: 12600+ confirmed COVID cases in U.S. 265 confirmed COVID deaths in U.S. Today: 6334150+ confirmed COVID cases in U.S. 189970+ confirmed COVID deaths in U.S. #TrumpKnew and the numbers speak for themselves. https://t.co/LGhQgPWBbq
How many lives could have been saved if Trump had actually been honest about the danger posed by the coronavirus? #TrumpKnew https://t.co/c2Cx8lB9IS

By passing the #HeroesAct @HouseDemocrats did something Trump has failed to do- #LEAD. 117 days ago Democrats passed legislation that responds to the #COVID19 pandemic by supporting states territories and localities. #SaveOurStates

The president intentionally chose to downplay #COVID19 and how deadly it would be. The damage this caused to millions of lives particularly those who lost loved ones or their lives is colossal and for so many irreparable. #SMDH https://t.co/OCj36zpHDE

Instead of: Helping the frontline heroes in state & local government… Feeding hungry families… Helping renters keep their homes… Ensuring all can vote safely… Republicans are proposing a “check the box” vote on an emaciated COVID-19 “plan?” No thanks. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/BoKM5rnUyr

District 24: If you have not completed your #2020census form please do so today. We need and deserve all of the federal resources that we can get to help recover from the #COVID19 pandemic! https://t.co/OMDZh3ceV9

Voting should be free fair and safe. Learn your state’s rules about mail-in ballots and key deadlines. Americans shouldn’t be forced to risk their lives during a #coronavirus pandemic to exercise the precious right to vote. Spread the word (not the virus) and #VoteFromHome! https://t.co/HUamWuo29Z

At @COVIDOversight’s first briefing bipartisan experts identified comprehensive testing tracing & targeted containment as key requirements to a safe reopening. Over two months later we have no #NationalStrategy & are seeing spikes in #COVID19 cases deaths & hospitalizations.

#Coronavirus trends are heading in the wrong direction yet some “red zone” governors refuse to adopt simple science-based measures to protect their residents. We need a #NationalStrategy with aggressive mitigation efforts to change this deadly trajectory & contain the virus. https://t.co/eplmTz6HX1
